Name: Anne Dwane
Why They Fit Skillvee: PERFECT FIT: Human capital + AI focus directly aligns with developer assessment. EdTech background (Chegg, Zinch) = understands skills evaluation.
Outreach Angle: Pitch as AI-powered talent assessment that shows HOW developers work, not just credentials. Reference her Military.com work on matching talent.

Why They Fit Skillvee: Enterprise AI focus perfect for B2B recruiting tool. GC has deep enterprise SaaS expertise and can lead rounds.
Outreach Angle: Position as Enterprise AI for technical hiring. Emphasize the 'day at work' simulation angle.
